description: A multitude of statistical tests, copulas and marginal distribution with functions for fitting data, calculating likelihoods and generate samples... Its intended purpose was modeling spike counts, but it can be used for other tasks.

info.Keywords:: copula distributions statistical modelling tests marginals maximum likelihood spike computational neuroscience

longdescription: A multitude of statistical tests, copulas and marginal distribution with functions for fitting data, calculating likelihoods and generate samples... Its intended purpose was modeling spike counts, but it can be used for other tasks.
